tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Dr. Bart is the best professor I\'ve had at Hillsdale so far. I\'m honestly surprised her rating isn\'t higher. Her papers are all connected and the way she designs them really minimizes your workload if you do it right and plan ahead. Her lectures are funny and can be inspiring. She\'s best in office hours though and always leaves a ton of comments.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  HILARIOUS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Dr. Bart is a wonderful woman and an engaging, humorous lecturer. Papers were reasonable and exams were fairly easy if you\'d done all the reading. Go to office hours and discuss paper ideas with her. She expects every student to participate in class discussion, so don\'t take her if you just want to listen to a lecture.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: While Bart is entertaining and had interesting insights, her lectures tended to be unstructured and difficult to take notes on, rarely changing my view of the text significantly. She was often unclear about expectations for assignments. She\'s not a bad teacher, but Hillsdale has so many other truly great English profs-- take one of them instead.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: Bart is an expert and she loves to teach. It is obvious that she wishes that all her students would attend grad school. A little difficult for a 300 level class. Laugh at her jokes and talk to her. Be ready to read a lot. She may spend 2 class periods on one page of literature and 5 minutes on a whole entire work.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Not an impossible class but she definitely makes you work for that B, and you have to put in a lot of effort for an A, but it\'s not impossible. Very well educated in her area of expertise, makes reading and class enjoyable and super educational. Don\'t take her if you\'re looking to skate by, though. Read for every class and be ready to participate.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: As long as you are willing to put in (even minimal) effort, you\'ll make it in this class. She\'s a killer on grammar in papers, but grades fair and makes you work for the A. But if you\'re not one for participating in class, don\'t take Bart, because she\'s pretty insistent on making sure everyone readsunderstands the material in the discussions.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: While she is a difficult grader, primarily on papers, she tells students what she expects and is very fair. If you know your stuff and present it well, you will get rewarded. She is ultra picky on MLA style in papers and ensure you have the edition of the books she tells you to! Visit her in office hours, she is Very helpful!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr Bart deserves better ratings than she currently has. I plan to attend grad school, and from what I have heard, she is unique in truly preparing me for this experience. Her class was the hardest I took in college, but the time I spent on the assignments was well worth it. She also has plenty of office hours, if you need to talk about the class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She was nice, but it was a bit difficult to catch everything she said during lectures. Her essay grading was picky, but fair. Tests were easy generally, however, they might throw you with a unexpected topic.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Terrible professor. Class lacked both structure and intelligence. The way we had to put out desks in a circle reminded me of preschool.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Excellent professor. She skillfully weaved between history and literature in a way that is necessary when studying ancient classics. She is known to be excellent during office hours but slightly less so in lecture. While some lectures were awkward, this was mainly because of her emphasis on student participation.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Worst class I have ever taken! Her lectures are extremely disorganized and impossible to take comprehensible notes on. Also useless during office hours. She talks way too much without having anything interesting to say. For her tests - study all of the random pictures she hands out in class and memorize all of the foreign words that she mentions.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Class is more like history than English, and is led by students more often than the teacher. She was fine, but I would not choose to take her as a professor again.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: One of the most underrated professors at Hillsdale. Her class was managable and edifying to students of any major/interest. I generally do not enjoy English classes and I would take this teacher over in a heartbeat.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: she\'s a badass. football guys-don\'t take her, she\'s too demanding for in season stuff-regular students-go for it, she\'s awesome. all you nerds at hillsdale should LOVE her.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Gotta love that woman, her lectures are very clear, she tells you what she wants on exams (with the exception of some really hard ones she puts on for fun) It is a good class B\'s aren\'t that hard to get but A\'s are. She is a very impartial grader and works hard to be that way. Papers were my downfall though, she is hard on grammer and not ideas.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr. Bart expects her Rhetoric class to be the only thing going on in your life. She acts like she is teaching graduate students not freshmen. If you go to talk to her she will talk forever without saying anything helpful. Tests are extremely hard but it is possible to do well. Her grading scale for papers is based only on which students she likes.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Bart is an absolute waste of time. 102 was more akin to a freakin\' book club than a class. She rarely lectured. Since she did not teach, I learned absolutely nothing from this "class." If you want to be bored/just get this class over with without learning, this is for you. If you take your education seriously take Jackson or Sommerville.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She was an extremely difficult-- but always fair--professor. I had her when she was new to Hillsdale, and I\'ve heard that the class is easier now. The lectures are difficult to keep up with. She\'s extremely helpful outside of class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr. Bart was extremely unhelpful. She is very biased and does not seem to care about your success. She calls out students when they do not deserve it.
